channel.title: Source + Client
channel.description:
I need a source and client, I've never coded before or learned [i]any[/i] java and I'm going to try and learn through making my own RuneScape Private Server. If anyone knows any decent sources and clients. (Try and keep both together so their the same. I don't know the difference between Delta, PI, Apollo ect.. Whichever is easier for beginners I guess.) (Sorry if it's in the wrong section :x)
Thanks, -Eddeh

item.title: Source + Client
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Read up on java for a few days and then start with hyperion.

Read full topic

item.title: Source + Client
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

You should start out with Allstar. Its the easiest to program (imo) and its what I started off programming with.

Read full topic

item.title: Source + Client
item.dc:creator: @Eddeh Eddeh
item.description:
@Eddeh wrote:

EDIT : I got the HyBriD PvP V3 Source and Client, but I’m not sure what to do, I think it’s an anti-leech, any ideas?

Thanks, -Eddeh

Read full topic

item.title: Source + Client
item.dc:creator: @Xi_ShiFt_iX Xi ShiFt iX
item.description:
@Xi_ShiFt_iX wrote:

I started with BrokenX V2 I think the download links are broken for it if you request ill send in a PM.

But there is plenty of tutorials on MoparScape and Youtube.
